descriptionlist.description: Add custom widgets right on your homescreen. This includes widgets such as time/date and apple's today widgets.
Widgets can be selected by tapping on a placeholder icon in wiggle mode.
Developers, if you want to create your own custom widgets take a look at documentation link below.

changelog.change: Photos Widget rewrite to support album and image picking with iOS 10+ support
Allow widget addition on empty pages that aren't going to be removed at the end of wiggle mode
Fix potential crash when dragging widget while page swiped off screen (for reuse)
Make modern widgets less rounder by default (applies to Battery Widget)
Developers can now specify custom starting size instead of using the minimum size
Fix today widget potentially causing crashes due to double free
Fix today widget causing crashes on iOS 10
